textBeforeTable: - Any -Off CampusOn Campus To see buildings not located on our main Spencer Hill Campus, select "Off Campus" below. CCC's Spencer Hill Main Campus is located in Corning, New York. It has four other locations in Corning, Elmira, and Big Flats. CCC also offers classes at more than 40 locations throughout Chemung, Schuyler, and Steuben Counties, as well as the Northern Tier of Pennsylvania. See a map of Spencer Hill Campus. Some courses are taught at non-CCC locations listed here.  Get Maps and Directions Locations Home You are here
